name: Nidoking
description: The Drill Pokémon. Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle. Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit with a melee attack, roll a 1d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of poison damage equal to this Pokémon’s proficiency modifier.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage when attacking a Pokémon of the same type.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: When activating a move that has a chance to impose a stat change or inflict a status, this creature instead doubles its move modifier for the damage with no chance of the additional effect.
